Generally Thunderbird will be configured in the user account on the local PC so having different signature on each device is as simple as adding them.

Just a word of warning though. Create signatures in Thunderbird. Folk using Microsoft office products to do so invariably have issues with the extensive CSS that MS office includes with the signature going forward.

For multiple signature on a single account on the same device. Try this add-on. https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/addon/signature-switch/?src=ss especially handy if you change job titles through the day.
